title: 99 Balls
description: Are you tired of ordinary bubble shooter games? Try 99 Balls, an innovate game that mixes gameplay fromBubble ShooterandBreakout! In this game, you need to destroy numbered balls before they reach the bottom of the screen. Each ball contains a number which indicates the number of hits it requires to be destroyed. Collect circles to increase the number of weapons you can throw at once. Collect stars to unlock new weapons! The further you proceed into the game, the higher the numbers on the balls become.
